This package is quisk_lppan_k3.
It is a companion to Quisk, a Software-Defined Radio (SDR) package.
It provides hardware support for Quisk to operate with the following:
- LP-PAN Panadapter http://telepostinc.com/LP-PAN.html
- Elecraft K3 amateur radio transceiver http://www.elecraft.com
- Fldigi digital mode software http://www.w1hkj.com

quisk_lppan_k3 was developed by Leigh L. Klotz, Jr. WA5ZNU
in collaboration with James Ahlstrom N2ADR.

Copyright 2009 Leigh L. Klotz, Jr.
All rights reserved.

quisk_lppan_k3 is made available under the GNU General Public License (GPL) v2.
See file license.txt for details.
